How many people are affected by infantile-onset spinocerebellar ataxia ?,More than 20 individuals with IOSCA have been identified in Finland. A few individuals with similar symptoms have been reported elsewhere in Europe.,GHR,infantile-onset spinocerebellar ataxia
What are the genetic changes related to infantile-onset spinocerebellar ataxia ?,"Mutations in the C10orf2 gene cause IOSCA. The C10orf2 gene provides instructions for making two very similar p
